section.marginalnote: Categories of applicants for restricted forest licences
section.sectiontext: For the purposes of section 13 (2.1) of the Act, the categories of applicants for which applications for a non-replaceable forest licence must only be invited are those categories that result from combining

paragraph.paragraphtext: one of the annual combined input capacities listed in the paragraphs under Column 1 of the table below and, for this purpose, the applicable paragraph refers to the annual combined input capacity of all the processing facilities owned or leased, or intended to be owned or leased, by the applicant,

one or more types of processing facilities listed in the paragraphs under Column 2 of the table below and, for this purpose, one or more of the applicable paragraphs refer to one or more of the processing facilities owned or leased, or intended to be owned or leased, by the applicant, and

one location listed in the paragraphs under Column 3 of the table below and, for this purpose, the applicable paragraph refers to the location of all the processing facilities owned or leased, or intended to be owned or leased, by the applicant.

section.sectiontext: A person is ineligible to be an applicant for a restricted forest licence if the person

paragraph.paragraphtext: holds,
is in control of a corporation that holds,
is a corporation that has 50% or more of its shares held by one or more shareholders who are also shareholders in a corporation that holds,
is a corporation that is controlled by a corporation that is also in control of a corporation that holds, or
is a corporation that is controlled by a corporation that holds
two or more restricted forest licences;
an agreement referred to in section 12 of the Act the rights in respect of which are under suspension, in whole or in part, under section 76 or 78 of the Act.

subsection.subsectiontext: An applicant for a restricted forest licence must, on the request of the minister, provide proof satisfactory to the minister that

paragraph.paragraphtext: each of the processing facilities owned or leased, or intended to be owned or leased, by the applicant meets all the criteria set out in this regulation in respect of the category applicable to the applicant, and
the applicant is eligible to be an applicant under this regulation.

subsection.subsectiontext: If a person does not provide proof in accordance with subsection (1), the minister may reject the application without further consideration.
